Name: England
Description: The largest and most populous country in the UK, known for its rich history, iconic landmarks, and cultural contributions.

Name: Scotland
Description: A country to the north of England, known for its scenic landscapes, historic castles, and cultural heritage.

Name: Wales
Description: A country to the west of England, known for its mountainous terrain, coastal villages, and Celtic culture.

Name: Northern Ireland
Description: Located on the island of Ireland, Northern Ireland is known for its rich political history, natural beauty, and vibrant cultural scene.
